response.headline: Crispy crème brûlée French toast in Seoul with custardy center and fluffy texture that absorbs custard
response.summary: French toast with crispy crème brûlée top and fluffy texture that absorbs custard, described as a dream taste. Located in Seoul where 422.3K people have posted about this place. User's number one priority while back in Seoul was eating good food.

location_tags: Seoul - 422.3K people posted about this place
